NewsItem.HEADLINE: Expert Insight for IoT Subscribers: The Business Structure of the 2030 IoT Market
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Analysis of how IoT and computing platforms will transform manufacturing and industrial processes. Strategic view of the driving forces and likely steps toward market development.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report includes strategic insight into different tiers of market development in industrial automation. Office automation in the Cloud is highlighted as an example of how a broad platform can be developed to host "applications" which then enable small customers to engage.
